Strutural MRI was downloaded from http://www.bic.mni.mcgill.ca/cgi/icbm_view/
(average of 152 T1-weighted stereotaxic volumes from the ICBM project)

mrirear.pcx
mriside.pcx
mritop.pcx

Images were converted from GIF to PCX and the side-view image was rotated so the head would be horizontal.
These images are used by the function besaplot to vizualize dipole location imported from the BESA software.

Oct 03, 2002 - Arnaud Delorme
